2. Find antiderivatives and integrals of functions with one variable

## Find the *derivative* of the following function

::: columns
::: {.column width="38%"}
::: example
::: ex-title
Example 1.8
:::
::: ex-cont
$f(x) = x^2 e^x$
:::
:::

::: theorem
::: thm-title
Product Rule
:::
::: thm-cont
$\dfrac{d}{dx} f(x)g(x) = f'(x)g(x) + f(x)g'(x)$
:::
:::

:::
:::

## Find the *derivative* of the following function

::: columns
::: {.column width="35%"}
::: example
::: ex-title
Example 1.9
:::
::: ex-cont
$f(x) = \frac{x^5}{2x+7}$
:::
:::

::: theorem
::: thm-title
Quotient Rule
:::
::: thm-cont
$\dfrac{d}{dx} \dfrac{f(x)}{g(x)} = \dfrac{g(x)f'(x) - f(x)g'(x)}{\big(g(x)\big)^2}$
:::
:::

:::
:::

## Find the *derivative* of the following function

::: columns
::: {.column width="33%"}
::: example
::: ex-title
Example 1.10
:::
::: ex-cont
$f(x) = e^{-2x+7}$
:::
:::

::: theorem
::: thm-title
Chain Rule
:::
::: thm-cont
$\dfrac{d}{dx} f\big(g(x)\big)= f'\big(g(x)\big)g'(x)$
:::
:::

:::
:::

::: columns
::: {.column width="30%"}
::: example
::: ex-title
Example 3.1
:::
::: ex-cont
$\displaystyle\int_0^1 (2x+x^5)dx$
:::
:::

:::
:::

## Solve the following integral

::: columns
::: {.column width="35%"}
::: example
::: ex-title
Example 3.2
:::
::: ex-cont
$\displaystyle\int_2^3 e^{-x}dx$
:::
:::

::: theorem
::: thm-title
U-substitution
:::
::: thm-cont
$\displaystyle\int f\big(g(x)\big) g'(x) dx = \displaystyle\int f(u) dx$
:::
:::

:::
:::

## Solve the following integral

::: columns
::: {.column width="30%"}
::: example
::: ex-title
Example 3.3
:::
::: ex-cont
$\displaystyle\int_2^3 x e^{x^2}dx$
:::
:::

:::
:::

## Solve the following integral

::: columns
::: {.column width="30%"}
::: example
::: ex-title
Example 3.4
:::
::: ex-cont
$\displaystyle\int_0^{\infty} x e^{-x}dx$
:::
:::

::: theorem
::: thm-title
Integrating by Parts
:::
::: thm-cont
$\displaystyle\int f(x) g'(x) dx = f(x)g(x) - \\ \displaystyle\int f'(x) g(x) dx$

OR

$\displaystyle\int_a^b u dv = uv\bigg|^b_a - \displaystyle\int_a^b vdu$
:::
:::

:::
:::
